meeting_info.organization: Government Performance and Financial Management Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor at City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the February 24, 2025, Government Performance and Financial Management Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Central Appraisal District FY 2025-26 Proposed Budget Overview
agenda_items.description: Overview of the proposed budget for the Dallas Central Appraisal District.

agenda_items.title: Office of Procurement Services Process Improvement
agenda_items.description: Discussion on contract management and authorization thresholds, including strike team findings and strategic initiatives implementation.

agenda_items.title: Update on Artificial Intelligence - City AI Plan
agenda_items.description: Discussion on governance, best practices, and upcoming projects related to the City AI Plan.

agenda_items.title: Review of City Real Estate for Development and Redeployment
agenda_items.description: Update on Cadillac Heights acquisition, project funding, phases, and next steps.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item #25-908A
agenda_items.description: FY 2024-25 Budget Ordinance Amendments related to Bullington Truck and Pedestrian Terminal and reallocation of American Rescue Plan Act funds.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Items Related to Private Solid Waste Collection Services
agenda_items.description: Public hearing and ordinance amending solid waste franchises.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item #25-1010A
agenda_items.description: Cooperative purchasing agreement for priority based budgeting software.

agenda_items.title: Monthly Budget Accountability Report FY 2024-25
agenda_items.description: Report on budget accountability as of January 31, 2025.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item #25-92A
agenda_items.description: Authorize revisions to financial management performance criteria related to employee benefits fund.

agenda_items.title: Monthly Technology Accountability Report
agenda_items.description: Report on technology accountability as of January 31, 2025.

agenda_items.title: Office of the City Auditor Monthly Internal Update
agenda_items.description: Update on internal audit reports released between February 15, 2025 and March 14, 2025.

agenda_items.title: Monthly American Rescue Plan Act (ARPA) Report
agenda_items.description: Report for the period ending February 28, 2025.

agenda_items.title: Report on Progress of Family Gateway Property Repairs
agenda_items.description: Update for window framing deterioration and repairs.

agenda_items.title: City Hall Space Planning Project
agenda_items.description: Analysis regarding space organization within Dallas City Hall.

agenda_items.title: Update on Property Leased by the City
agenda_items.description: Update on properties leased by the city.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item #25-845A
agenda_items.description: Authorize a five-year master agreement for the purchase of motor fuels.
